genre.name: first person shooter
genre.description: From a first person view, you are fighting and shooting at players or AI-controlled non-player characters
genre.suggested_games: Battiefield 6, Call of Duty Warzone, Apex Legends, Counter-Strike 2

genre.name: real-time strategy
genre.description: From a top-down view, you are building a base and trying to destroy the opponents' base

genre.name: city builder
genre.description: From a top-down view, you are building and growing a city - usually these are economic simulators, but some games can contain combat
genre.suggested_games: Civilization 7, Age of Empires IV, Company of Heroes 3

genre.name: simulation
genre.description: Something that simulates a world, usually quite in-depth management simulations have this type of gameplay
genre.suggested_games: Ground of Aces, PowerWash Simulator 2, Kingmakers
